SEARCH
Package model

Class SaleList

java.lang.Object
model.SaleList
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class SaleList extends Object implements Serializable
The SaleList class represents a collection of sales. It provides methods to retrieve, add, edit, and remove Sale objects from the list. This class implements the Serializable interface for object serialization.
Version:
1.0
Author:
Guillermo Sánchez Martínez

    • SaleList

      public SaleList()
      Constructs an empty SaleList object. Initializes an empty ArrayList to store Sale objects.

      Constructs a SaleList object with a given list of Sale objects.
      Parameters:

  • Method Details

    • getSaleByID

      public Sale getSaleByID(int saleID)
      Gets a Sale by its unique sale ID.
      Parameters:
      saleID - the unique ID of the sale
      Returns:
      the Sale object with the matching saleID, or null if no sale with the given ID is found

    • getSaleList

      public ArrayList<Sale> getSaleList()
      Gets the list of all sales in the SaleList.
      Returns:
      the list of Sale objects in the SaleList

    • addSale

      public void addSale(Sale sale)
      Adds a new Sale to the SaleList.
      Parameters:
      sale - the Sale object to add to the list

    • editSale

      public void editSale(int saleID, Sale newSale)
      Edits an existing Sale in the SaleList by replacing it with a new Sale object.
      Parameters:
      saleID - the ID of the Sale to edit
      newSale - the new Sale object to replace the old one

    • removeSale

      public void removeSale(Sale sale)
      Removes a Sale from the SaleList.
      Parameters:
      sale - the Sale object to remove

      Returns a string representation of all Sales in the SaleList.
